fields_of_interest: Competition, Culture, Education and training, Communication
eu_initiatives: EU copyright law review; trade agreement negotiations and IPR; data protection; copyright enforcement
organisation_name: International Federation of Reproduction Rights Organisations (IFRRO)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: IFRRO, the International Federation Reproduction Rights Organisations (RROs), is an independent body which promotes efficient Collective Management of rights through RROs, works to increase the lawful use and to eliminate the unauthorised use of copyright works, and provides various opportunities and proactive support for rightholder on a European as well as international level.  IFRRO supports creators and publishers alike through the organisations in its membership and helps them to find and maintain appropriate legal frameworks for the protectionand use of test-and image-based works.
relevant_communication: ARROW, RDI, CopyrightLink; IFRRO events and publications
